title: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft function on lines that contain a mix of spaces and tabs in a default text editor, nothing moves.
EB: The ShiftLeft function should correctly indent the lines, moving them to the left by one tab stop.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type the following:
   - A space
   - Several tabs
   - Some text
   - Several tabs
   - Some text 2
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft function.
5. Verify that nothing moves.
